title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\TrafficTarget
name: TrafficTarget
description:
Holds a single traffic routing entry for the Service. Allocations can be done to a specific Revision name, or pointing to the latest Ready Revision.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.TrafficTarget

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.type
params.description: The allocation type for this traffic target.

params.name: data.revision
params.description: Revision to which to send this portion of traffic, if traffic allocation is by revision.

params.name: data.percent
params.description: Specifies percent of the traffic to this Revision. This defaults to zero if unspecified.

params.name: data.tag
params.description: Indicates a string to be part of the URI to exclusively reference this target.
